label: 西川如見
本: The Cambridge History of Japan, Volume 4:  Early Modern Japan . Cambridge University Press . 1991
説明文: (1648-1724) A merchant astronomer in Nagasaki, Joken penned two enormously successful didactic tracts aimed specifically at commoners, one entitled Chōnin bukuro...and the other Hyakushō bukuro (p. 630). [長崎、町人嚢、百姓嚢]
